H0.text: With what area of expertise do you associate the name of Annie Leibovitz. Art

H1.text: With what area of expertise do you associate the name of Annie Leibovitz. Fashion

H2.text: With what area of expertise do you associate the name of Annie Leibovitz. Journalism

H3.text: With what area of expertise do you associate the name of Annie Leibovitz. Photo's

A4.text: Anna-Lou Leibovitz is an American portrait photographer best known for her portraits, particularly of celebrities.

A5.text: Leibovitz's Polaroid photo of John Lennon and Yoko Ono, taken five hours before Lennon's murder, is considered one of Rolling Stone magazine's most famous cover photographs.
